# SRWristDetection.WristLocation.left

**Case**

Indicates that the user wears a watch on the left wrist.

## Declaration

```swift
case left
```

## Wrist Preferences

- **SRWristDetection.WristLocation.right**: Indicates that the user wears a watch on the right wrist.
